Text: I wanted to thank you for the New X-Men pack. I feel like its my birthday! That run got me excited to read comics again after giving up somewhere around 1995. You are the best my friend!

you're very welcome marvelnerd76. that one wasn't hard to do (after i actually took the time to locate it) because someone else had assembled the set, RARed it together. i just clicked a few buttons to share it here ... but yes, it's a great collection and one of my favorites too. thanks for saying thanks, comments like yours make ALL OF IT worthwhile.
Wasn't there supposed to be 32 pages in this?

rirsss, 32 page comic, the ads are taken out.
this scan = 25 pages = 3 cover scans + 21 pages of story (including one double-page spread) + 1 scanner tag image = 25
No, I mean, wasn't there supposed to be a back-up story of Hal Jordan and Sinestro? Or was it only shown on last page?
that's the comic. maybe next month?
